title: Tickets Tab Badging - Unverified
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has installed Ballpark App
AND user is logged in with an unverified account
AND user has tickets associated with the account

*Testing Notes:[How to test Ballpark Features with an Unverified Account with Tickets](https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/BET/pages/2587656220/How+to+test+Ballpark+Features+with+an+Unverified+Account+with+Tickets)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user logins into Ballpark 
AND user is on the Home Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the alert badge on the Wallet icon in the bottom navigation view is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user sends app to background and brings back to foreground with tickets that still have an unverified email address
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the alert badge on the Wallet icon in the bottom navigation view is still displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user verifies the email address associated with tickets in ticket summary
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the alert badge on the Wallet icon in the bottom navigation view is removed

title: Embargoed Barcode
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has installed Ballpark App
AND user is logged in with an account
AND user has tickets associated with the account which has ticket with embargoes barcode
custom_steps: WHEN user tap on “Forward Tickets” in the ticket-list view

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN use have a valid embargoed ticket 

AND user select “Forward tickets”
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be presented a checkbox to select (if have multiple ticket) and forwarding should be enabled

(Don't auto Select if user have multiple ticket will be covered in [test case](https://testrail.testeng.mlbinfra.net/index.php?/cases/view/29995582&group_by=cases:section_id&group_order=asc&group_id=1251461 ))
AND user able to forward tickets without any issue

title: Tickets Tab Deep Links
custom_preconds:
NOTE: Legacy TicketTab view shown for BP app versions prior to 13.0.0 release. Legacy view is also planned to be viewable and able to toggle between, during early BETA releases of 13.0.0

GIVEN the user downloaded the Ballpark app (10.1.0 or greater)
AND the user has BallPark account
AND the user has been given a deeplink


*when User has Legacy flow enabled, the deeplinks directs user appropriately to the Legacy views. Comparably, when user has Beta flow enabled, the deeplinks directs user appropriately to the Beta views.
custom_steps: Log in to an account and have the app open AND click the deep link.
custom_expected: The expected view is shown in the Ballpark app

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user accesses deeplink of ballpark://wallet
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the Ballpark app is opened up to the Tickets tab 
AND the Wallet sub tab shown

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user accesses deeplink of ballpark://buytickets
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the Ballpark app is opened up to the Tickets tab
AND the Buy Tickets sub tab shown

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user accesses deeplink of ballpark://buytickets?teamID=158
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the Ballpark app is opened up to the Tickets tab 
AND the Buy Tickets sub tab shown
AND the Milwaukee Brewers team os selected with scheduled events listed
